choices: "Normal Sized Video Game Character" (mostly from their perspective)
1.content:
Why hello there reader! I'm Professor Coke! Now before you begin this story, please tell me...

Are you the "shrunken human", the "Normal sized video game character", or will you follow the story of a shrunken in-game character?
1.title: Who are you? Who will you follow?

11.content:
You will be a 12-18 year old person, who likes to play video games.


It is Tuesday afternoon, and you are sitting on your couch playing video games. You get thirsty, so you go and get a drink. When you get back, the TV screen is shining very brightly. "What's wrong with my TV?" You ask yourself as you walk over to inspect it. When you get close to the TV, you try unplugging it, but it doesn't turn off. "Why didn't it turn off? maybe I should-!". Your thoughts were interrupted by the sound of the TV whirring. The harsh light then began to get brighter and brighter until it was so bright that you had to look away. You took one last look at the screen, and everything suddenly went black. The TV stopped shining, but you were gone.

You start to regain consciousness. You feel your eyes burning and your body aching. "What happened?" you think, 'Am I... Blind?'. You attempt to open your eyes, and with difficulty, you do. You get up, and try to figure out where you are. You look around for a bit, and inspect the area to see if you can find out how you got here. The place that you are in looks familiar...

What world did you land in?
11.title: "Shrunken Human"

112.content: You are in a grassy field with a lake and a small mountain in the distance. You get up and you realize that you're shrunken down to about the size of a blade of grass. You think to yourself, 'Woah! I'm really small! How did I get this way?'. Suddenly, you hear a rustling sound. You look to your left, but you see nothing. You dismiss it as something else and turn back around, only to see the massive face of.......
112.title: Pokemon world

1121.content:
"Suicune..." You whisper in awe. You have always loved Pokemon, all 5 generations, all 649 of em'. You caught them all, but now you get to meet one! And it's Suicune no less! The giant pokemon was breathtakingly beautiful, and also quite intimidating. It just stared at you for 3 minutes until it finally decided to crouch down and scoop you up in it's mouth. "H-hey!" you cried as it began to walk somewhere, "Where are you taking me!? Why are you doing this!?!?? What's going o-GAH!" Suicune started to lick you all over and move you you around her mouth at painful speeds, as if to get you to shut up. In 45 minutes Suicune stopped moving but continued to lick you for 15 more minutes. Apparently, it liked your taste.

After the licking spree was over, Suicune spat you out onto a little stone shrine and stared at you. "We've finally found the perfect one" Suicune said. "Woah WHAT! You can talk!!?!" You yelled. "Yes" she said, "all legendary Pokemon can talk, we just choose not to unless we need to communicate with humans." You take a minute to take this in, then you ask, "So, why did you bring me here? It's not like i'm some legendary hero or anything." Suicune gives you a strong look and replies, "You see human the reason you are here is to be the Legendary pokemon's......
1121.title: Suicune

choices: Under Suicune's crushing foot or belly
On the stone shrine staring at another legendary Pokemon
11211.content:
"What!" You cry, "Pet slave! But why!". "You see human, legendary Pokemon are always on the go: attending to disasters, making disasters, running from humans, escaping humans, being bored.... I think you get it." Suicune said, "Because of this, legendaries get tired, and angry. And that's where you come in.". "Me!" you say, "What does that have to do with me!?!?". "Well you see human you would make a nice stress ball for tense legendaries, a cleaner, something for sexual intentions, a foot toy, a snack, a nice seat, something for venting out our anger at humans, even something we can abuse physically to see what it's like to be evil, and more." Suicune explained.

At that point your eye was just twitching, and you suddenly passed out from shock. "He must have passed out from excitement." She said, "Might as well have some fun". She lightly pressed her foot down on him and grinded him into the dirt, and proceeded to lay her stomach on his body, and fall asleep.

Where will you be when you wake up?
11211.title: Pet Slave

11212.content: "You see human, the reason you are here is to be the Legendary Pokemons' Savior and Protector." Suicune said to you. "What do you mean? Aren't you able to protect yourselves?" You asked.
11212.title: Savior and Protector

1123.content: You look up and see a Gardevoir
1123.title: Other.

11232.content: Maybe your into the humen characters in pokemon.
11232.title: Pokemons or humens

113.content: You actually don't recognize this place at first sight. With difficulty you start walking in one direction. As you keep walking in the empty room you find something that shocks you. What you found was a crate but you weren't shocked because it was a crate what shocked you was that it was huge compared to you. At first you thought it just must've been a huge crate, but as you looked at the floor you also noticed the tiles were huge too. Deciding that maybe it would be best to get help now since you became tiny, you head to what looks to be a huge door. As you near it, there seems to be a symbol on it. On closer inspection you get another big surprise as you realize you know what the symbol stands for. It is the...
113.title: Star Fox

1131.content: You know this emblem, you've seen it many time before when playing video games. As you look at the Star Fox emblem you can't help but feel excited. You know where you were now, you were somehow transported to a video game world. Even though you were excited it didn't last long though. As realization sank in you had forgotten that you might not be able to get home now at all since you are now in a video game world. As you neared the door, you hoped that it would slide open when you walked up to it. As you stood right in front of the door nothing happen, you must be too small for the door to recognize you. As you looked around for another way out, the door behind you opened. Excited you turned around only to have your view blocked off by a giant foot. As you looked up you had to back up a bit to see the face of the owner of the foot. As you finally saw their face you recognized this person. It was
1131.title: Star Fox emblem

choices: Getting to Fox but he still doesn't notice you
As you're running Fox notices you
11311.content: You were surprised to see Fox here. Even though you saw the emblem you were still surprised to see him. As you looked up at him though, you were glad that he was the one that showed up. He doesn't seem to notice you though as he walk by. Looking up at him, you don't even move when passes over you. As he keeps walking you realize that Fox is your safest chance for help. He's one of the good guys, so there's a bigger chance he'll help you. As you start running to him, you end up...
11311.title: Fox McCloud

choices: You decide to climb his foot
113111.content: Luckily for you Fox had stopped walking as he started looking at some boxes that were in the room. Even though it still took you a while you were still able to make it to him before he started walking again. You looked up hoping he might've noticed you but it seems he didn't as he was looking inside of the huge box. You couldn't help but feel excited in feeling that you might meet Fox McCloud. You never thought you would ever meet a character from a video game but here you are standing at Fox's feet. You decide to jump up and down to try to get his attention but it doesn't seem to be working as he is focusing on what he is doing. As you think of ways to get his attention...
113111.title: Getting to Fox but he still doesn't notice you

choices: Nope you'll have to try something while his bent down.
1131112.content:
You quickly began to worry a little when you saw Fox check some things off on a piece of paper while he let out, "Well, everything appears to be in here. I better move on to the next one so that I can get this done as soon as possible."

"Hmm, I wonder what he was looking at in that box? You thought, before you saw the giant anthro fox slowly start to turn to face you.

When he did this though you saw the piece of paper that was in hand slip through his fingers and land onto the floor right behind you. Once this had happened he sighed heavily as he said, "Well, this isn't going to make this job go any faster."

While he bent done to pick it though did he notice you or not?
1131112.title: His finished with the box

11311121.content:
When the paper hit the floor you took your chance and ran to it luckily it fell close to you so you were able to get to it before Fox picked it up. As you watched Fox bend down you decided to jump and wave your hands to get his attention. As Fox was picking up the paper you were standing on his eyes fell on you and they widened once they realized what you were. You were promptly picked up and dropped into Fox's palm.

"Who are you, and what are you doing here?" Fox asks as he seems to look your tiny body over. You then explain your predicament to Fox on how you got here and who you were. "So you see I'm pretty much lost and don't know what to do especially now that I'm really small." You tell Fox as he seems to be listening to your story. "So you want me to believe that in your world I'm a video game character and your TV just happened to shine and it somehow brought you here and shrunk you, that's a little hard to believe don't you think." Fox says seeming to not believe you. " I'm not lying what would I gain from that, at this size I'll literally take hours to maybe leave this room and I also have no weapons and I showed myself to you since I needed help from someone and I know your a hero." You say hoping to convince Fox you're not lying. While you don't know if you convinced him Fox's ears did perk up when you called him a hero. As you looked up at his face trying to put on a pitiful look so that he can believe you, and it seems Fox has a
11311121.title: Yes he did.

113111211.content: Looking at Fox's face gave you a bit of relief as he seemed to have believed you. "Well even though your story is far fetched there's no reason why you would shrink yourself and sneak in here somehow and try to get noticed unless you really needed help." Fox says as he brought you closer to his face. "So is there a way to help me or am I stuck like this?" You ask as you sit on Fox's palm enjoying how soft his fur is. "I'm not going to lie to you I don't know if we have something that can grow you back or not and I need to finish checking to make sure all the boxes have what we ordered so you're going to have to wait a bit hope your fine with that, if you're not I'll ask someone else if they can help you instead." Fox says as he gives you a bit of an apologetic look. As you look at him you decide to...
113111211.title: Understanding look on his face

choices: put you in my front jacket pocket."
1131112111.content:
Even though Fox had given you a choice to stay with him or not. You already knew what you wanted to do as you looked up at his face and said, "Well, if it's alright with you Fox I'd like to stay with you."

To your surprise you saw a smile of relief on the anthro fox's face while he replied, "Thanks, that's nice of you since I've been kind of lonely lately."

Hearing this caught your attention while you asked,"What do you mean by that Fox? Isn't team Star Fox still together?"

"Oh yes my team and I are still together. But both have been pretty busy as of late. Slippy's been with his girlfriend for the past few days. And Falco went off to take care of solo missions..." The vulpine began, before he trailed off.

"Wait a minute Fox, what about Krystal?" You wondered, even though you weren't for sure if she was with Fox's team or with team Star Wolf.

Once you had said this though a very sad expression had shown on the giant light brown and white furred fox's face as he started with, "Oh Krystal, she......left the team about a year ago to go and be with Panther."

"Oh, I'm sorry. If I had known that I wouldn't have asked. Since the last thing I want to make you regret helping me." You replied with a very sorry tone in your voice.

To your surprise though you saw Fox shake his head from side to side when he told you, "No, that's ok. Besides you didn't know about it."

"Well, would you like to talk about it? I mean it's the least I can do since your willing help to me and all." You suggested, as the fox brought you a bit closer to his face.

Upon doing this he then said, "Well, alright then. But while I'm telling you this and checking the boxes I don't want you to fall and get hurt. So how about I...
1131112111.title: Staying with Fox.

113131.content:
It was Krystal!! You back up in both shock and fright sure she looked cute and fuzzy but she was still big enough to kill you with one toe, but even though you know this you still needed her help you couldn’t survive on your own. “Hey down here!! You shouted waving your arms hoping the giant vixen sees you. While you were trying to get her attention you noticed her ear flick “yes she heard me” you sighed in relief but your relief was short lived when you saw the underside of her sandal.

“Crap!!” You quickly dived out of the way as the vixens foot came down missing you by inches. “Hello who’s there?” You heard Krystal say. Jumping back up to your feet you began shouting again and this time she saw you. “What’s this?” The vixen said as she squats down to get a better look at the strange creature.

You couldn’t help but blush a little at the sight of her crotch hanging overhead there was something else you noticed beside the faint outline of a camel toe. You expected Krystal to either be wearing a jump suit or her tribal clothing but she was wearing a tank top some sweatpants and sandals. The vixen noticed your staring and started to growling “hey my eyes are up here.”

Your eyes immediately darted back to her face when you heard her talk “crap I think I made her mad” you thought. “Sorry it’s just...well...your so big” you finished awkwardly. Krystal just had an amused look on her face “haha I don’t think I’m big maybe your just tiny” the vixen said playfully. You just shrugged “yeah maybe your right...oh wait a second do you know were we are!” You said frantically.

“Your in my cargo bay which reminds me what are you doing in here and how did you get on board?” Krystal said. “I have no idea...one second I’m at home watching TV and now I’m here” you said gesturing around you. Krystal hummed in thought “well I can’t think of anyway you could’ve gotten on board” Krystal said giving an hopeless shrug. You started to feel a little dizzy from realising just how screwed you are. Krystal noticed your worried look “Hey don’t worry I’ll look after you at least until we can find out how you got here.”

You perked up a little at hearing Krystal say she’ll take care of you “thank you miss you have you idea how grateful I am” you said giving a little bow. Krystal giggled at how polite you were being “well I can’t just leave a poor little thing like yourself to wander around and having to dodge my every step now can I” Krystal said jokingly.

“Yeah you got that right big foot” you joked back. “So um what now then?” You said. “Well first things first let’s get out of here” Krystal said placing her hand beside you to climb on. Hesitantly you climbed onto her palm and sat down while she stood up and left the cargo bay heading to.
113131.title: Krystal

1131313.content:
The room Krystal brought you into had a bar some furniture and from what you can tell some kind of computer game. “Well this is where everyone come to chill out or relax” Krystal said as she made her way over to the couch that was in the centre of the room. The vixen sat down the couch it slightly creaked in protest “must be an old couch” you muttered not wanting the fox to think you were calling her fat.

“So what do you wonna do?” The question caught you off guard you weren’t expecting to ask you what you wanted to do. “Well what is there to do?” You asked. Krystal hummed in thought “well we can have a drink or talk or maybe play a game.”

You choose.
1131313.title: Rec room

113134.content:
Okay, so none of those others choices interested you huh? Then how about you end up being found by Fox’s father, James McCloud. And since his the originsl leader of the group that could be pretty interesting do you think?

Of course if that isn’t good enough then you always pick someone else.
113134.title: The Originsl Leader Of Star Fox

choices: N64 era. (Star Wolf are bad guys)
1132.content:
You found yourself letting out a gasp upon realizing that you were in a storage room for none other then Team Star Wolf. Not only were you left speechless, but you felt a slight shiver go down your spine as you weren't sure which version of the team you would have to try to interactive with. And so with this in mind you began to look around the room to see which era you were in. On the one hand you could be dealing with the N64 version of the Star Wolf Team, which not only had four members, but you remember that all four of them were bad guys as a part of Andross's army. On the other hand if it seemed like something from Assault then that might not be so bad since there were only three members and were considered anti-heroes which you thought was cool when they helped out the Star Fox Team a few times in that game. Along with this you figured that either Wolf or Panther would be willing to help....maybe even Leon...although you weren't completely sure about that.

And so when you looked around the room you saw that it looked like you were in the......
1132.title: Star Wolf emblem

11322.content: You let out a big sigh of relief once you had looked around the large storage room and didn't see any signs of Team Star Wolf being with Andross, which meant that you were going to be seeing the Assault version of the team. This brought a smile to your face as you hoped that they might be able to you. Or at the very least one of them would be willing to take care of you and keep you safe if you couldn't be returned back to normal size. But as you placed your right hand underneath your chin to try and figure out a way to out of the this room the giant door slid open. And when this happened you looked up and saw.....
11322.title: Assault era. (Star Wolf are anti-heroes)

113222.content: Once the door had openeed completely you quickly realized that the giant anthro that was standing in front of you was not Wolf. In fact it was actually.....
113222.title: Panther or Leon?

114.content:
Okay!
Now which character(s) will you encounter?
114.title: Sonic The Hedgehog

choices: Super Smash Bros. Brawl "The World of Trophies"  (subspace emissary)
115.content: Not those? Okay, how about these!
115.title: Smash Bros or Kirby?

1152.content: Do you want to encounter a male giant or a female giant?
1152.title: Kirby

choices: You get transported to Dreamland from the games
You get transported to Dreamland from the anime
11521.content:
[You are 15. A boy. You hated school and wasn't very liked in there. Constantly bullied, you always played some Nintendo games after school, to relieve some stress)

You were just playing the newest Kirby game (Kirby Star Allies). Thinking about all of the friends Kirby met, how cool must it be to live with him, play with him, have adventures and never worry about anything. They rather don't go to school, every day is just having fun or adventuring. You thought to yourself "I'd want to live with him too"...
And then you said this oit loud.

-Man. I really wish to live in Kirby's world...
11521.title: The beginning.

choices: Other kirby character finds you (enemy, secondary character, other color Kirby)
115211.content:
Suddenly, everything around you started to shake. The switch started to glow in a lot of different colors, and then suddenly vanished. The same happened to your TV, then your amiibos, and then all of your other stuff in the room had the same fate. The room you were in was completely bare, and it seemed to get smaller and smaller, until the room was so small that you had to sit down in order to not get crushed. And then suddenly, light blinded you. It took you some time to get used to it, and when you did, you slowly started to see the environment around you. You were somewhere outside... sitting on some light ground... weirdly huge grass all around... And then you looked at the sky, and everything clicked. You were in Kirby's world! But why was the grass so huge? And then you looked around some more. It wasn't just grass. Everything around you was huge! You were transported to Dreamland, but at a cost.

Your size.
115211.title: Be careful what you wish for...

1152111.content: Before we continue with the story, we need to estabilish just how small are you?
1152111.title: Kirby finds you

11521112.content: Are you the size of a centimeter or milimeter?
11521112.title: One milimeter

115211121.content: You suddenly heard some humming, coming from the distance. It was getting louder and louder, with accompanying thumps, that were also getting louder. You quickly recognized the voice - it was Kirby! He's having a stroll on the road that you're shrunken on! The ground began to shake. You didn't see him coming though - it had to be from the other side of the road. So you turned back, and... Was met by a gigantic pink-red wall. It was Kirby's shoe.
115211121.title: Giant Pink Menace

11522.content: Which female giant do you want?
11522.title: Female giant

11531.content: who's the lucky girl or boy?
11531.title: Super Mario Bros

11532.content: Do you found yourself shrunk around a humanoid robot girl named Curly?
11532.title: Cave Story

115322.content: How about you meet Sue the human girl who got transformed into a Mimiga?
115322.title: A Mimiga?

choices: A legend of Spyro: the eternal night
A legend of Spyro: dawn of the dragons
115331.content:
You are a fan of the Spyro games. particularly a legend of Spyro and the eternal night and a legend of spyro dawn of the dragons. Though you have a lot of the other games these two were your favorite.

Whilst in the middle of playing one of your favorites your tv suddenly has a few flashs indicating that something wasn't working properly.

However when you attempt to reset your tv and console by unplugging it the tv remained on and oddly enough it looked like some sort of cutscene you've never seen before was playing. You decided to watch and see what it was.

It played out like a movie except at what seemed to be the end of it where both Spyro and Cynder look at you or the camera from what you thought.

And then then boom. A bright flash of light burst out of nowhere engulfing you and your surroundings.

You open your eyes after experiencing this sudden burst of light to find yourself no longer in your house but next to trees next to a river the grass notably soft but rough at the same time.

You realize that you weren't dreaming when someone yelled."Look out!" As you turned to see who said it something it you knocking you off your feet leaving you with a grase on your back.

"Oow! Hey what fu-" you stop in shock and awe of your favorite video game character on the ground next to you.

And like a sensible person you faint. Half from meeting your idle face to face and the other being hit really hard.
115331.title: Spyro the dragon

choices: Lucas(You'd love his company right about now)
Alec(He's real wise so he should be able to help you)
11533212.content:
You awake with a groan and grasp your head tightly saying "What hit me?" you try to recollect your thoughts but all you can remember is that you were playing Smash bros. brawl, the screen went white and then everything's a blur after that. You do remember that you're Jackson (though you prefer Jack) a 12 year old boy who loves video games. "I think I've got amnesia." you sigh and shake your head "No time to worry about that now, for now I should try to figure out where I am."

You look around and see that your in a forest of some kind (Wait a sec this is the sunshine forest from mother 3!) you think to your self you look down and find that you've shrunk! You've got to find help and fast. (Your first choice is Lucas who would be some good company right now but he probably wouldn't know how to help you in your current state, then there's Alec Lucas & Claus' grandfather, from what you remember about him he knows a lot of mysterious things, He can probably help you out in your current situation.) after thinking it over you decide to go to..
11533212.title: Mother 3(Lucas' world)

choices: "You can stay at the yado inn!"
115332121.content:
(A/N: Almost forgot this story is supposed to take place after mother 3 just so you know)

You decide to go find Lucas sense you'd like to make a friend out of him anyway & the track up to Alec's should probably take you a week in your curent state and you for one don't have the time. You find Lucas going through the village on a walk, you go over to him.

"Lucas!!!" You shout hoping your tiny voice reached his ears, he begins to look around asking "Who said that?" Trying to find the source of the voice. "Down here!!!" You shout back hoping he heard you again, to your great joy he did and is now looking down at you.

"Who are you? What happened to you? & how'd you know my name?" He suddenly asks not knowing what to do in this situation, you give him a smile saying "For your first two questions my name is Jack & I don't know how but somehow I got teleported to your world & got shrunk in the Process, as for the third question it's kinda head to explain so don't question it alright?" You say finishing your explanation. You see Lucas with his eyes closed most likely taking all this in until he opens his eyes again saying "Well, if that's the case then your gonna need a place to stay where you'll be safe so..."
115332121.title: meeting the crybaby turned hero

choices: "Are you ticklish?" (Reader's choice on where he's ticklish)
1153321211.content:
(A/N just so you all know in this story Hinawa & Claus got brought back to life after Lucas turned everything back to normal and woke the dragon)

"Are you absolutely sure about that Lucas? I mean, I don't want to intrude on you or your family." you say trying to be modest, "I'm quite sure, Jack." Your about to protest but Lucas cuts you off "Besides, my family would love to let you stay and for one thing ounce they heard your story they wouldn't take no for an answer anyway." He says laughing a bit, You sigh seeing no room for argument with him you go along with his decision.

"Hey Mom, Dad, Claus you'll never guess what I found in town today!" Lucas says excitedly as he goes through the front door of his house, "Your back already Lucas, What did you find?" says a tough but dependable man in a cowboy hat whom you assume to be Lucas' father. "Oh, what is it, what is it!?!" says an energetic kid who you assume to be Lucas' twin brother. "Now now, Claus let Lucas speak." says a kind woman in a red dress with brown hair, whom if you had to guess is Lucas' mother.

"Thank you, mother. Anyway, while I was out walking in the village I found this shrunken person calling for help so I decided to bring him here where he'll be safe." he says bringing you up so everyone can see you. "Uh, hi." you say blushing a bit at the attention your getting, "There's no need to be shy little one." Lucas' mother says kindly, "What's your name?" she asks you.

"Jack." you say to her as she gives you another kind smile, "Nice to meet you Jack, I'm Hinawa, Lucas' mother. The man in the cowboy hat is my husband, Flint..." Hinawa says pointing over at her husband, "Hey there." he responds with a polite wave. "The boy over there is my other son, Claus..." "Hey." he says simply going back to doing what he was doing earlier. You suddenly hear a whimpering noise come from near Lucas' feet and look down to find a brown dog looking at you curiously, "...And that's our pet dog, Boney." Hinawa says finishing her explanation, "Say hi to our new friend boy!" Lucas says to which Boney barks in response.

"Okay, now that introductions are over how about some dinner?" Hinawa asks not waiting for a response as she heads in to the kitchen to start on dinner while you & Lucas head to his room Claus stays in the living room to play with Boney & Flint sits at the dining room table to read the newspaper.

As you & Lucas are in his room (him on the bed you on a pillow) you think it would be best to strike up a conversation, "Hey, Lucas. This may seem out of the blue but I was wondering.."
1153321211.title: "How about you stay with me"

choices: Cut to when you & Lucas and Claus are in the bath getting reedy for bed
11533212112.content:
"Wow, you weren't kidding when you said it would be out of the blue." Lucas says with a slight laugh before continuing, " To answer your question though Jack, yes I am." "Any idea where?" You ask with a raised eyebrow, to which he replies "That's for me to know & for you to find out!" With a challenging tone in his voice.

"Well then Lucas, I acsept your challenge!" Without another word you launch yourself forward to get into Lucas' shirt and begin to go to town on his belly & belly button which sends him into a giggling fit while he says "Eeeek! HAHAHAHA NOT THERE HAHAHAHA THAT'S MY MOST TICKLISH SPOT!!!" "Is that so, anywhere else?" You ask to which he states "Please don't make me say it!" With a pleading look on his face you chuckle a bit at this before saying "Don't worry man I just wanted to have a little fun with you." He takes a few breaths before saying "Yeah, I know. I enjoyed that thank you." You give him a smile saying "Your welcome."

Suddenly Hinawa's voice rings out saying "Boys, time for dinner!" To which Lucas says "Coming, Mom!" He then picks you up in his palm & says "let's go." You nod your head in agreement as the two of you head to the dinning room.
11533212112.title: "Are you ticklish?" (Reader's choic...

11533212113.content:
You said to Lucas" I was wondering, when do you think that I will be back to my original size?"
Lucas reply " I hope very soon, in the meantime, you will stay here with me and my family until we find a way to return you back to normal."
" Ah, alright I understand.... I hope that I won't be a bother to you Lucas."
"You won't, cause you are my friend. Friends always help each other no matter what. Don't worry about it."
"If you say so."
"Tomorrow, we will ask one of my friends to help you out, so rest assured, tomorrow is going to be a great day."
"You are right man. Goodnight Lucas!!''
"Goodnight my friend"
11533212113.title: (Reader's choice)

1153322.title: Fire Emblem?

115332221.content: Lets start this simple with the main character of the series.
115332221.title: Yeah, sure!

1153322212.content: What about the OTHER main character, the black-white witch?

11533222221231.content:
You don't feel right, you do remember that your name is Jake and that you are a 12 year old gamer you are an only child that lives in a foster home because your parents died when you were only 2 years old. After they passed you were put up for adoption in a foster care program eventually you did get adopted by a kind young man & woman in their late 20's named John & Jasmine, to your great joy they immediately Took a strong liking to you they even thought of you as their own full blooded son.

You had started playing Persona 3:FES when all of a sudden there's a bright flash of light and everything else is just a blur after that. As you begin to come to you look around and see that your inside one of the game's dorms as you begin to try and figure out which dorm your in a voice rings out over you saying "Yes, my wish worked!" You look for the source of the voice and find a 11 year old boy looking down at you. Is he kind to you?

115332222222.title: Pikmin

1153322222222.content: Hmm, alright then how about one of the Sly Cooper games? That could be pretty interesting right?
1153322222222.title: Sly Cooper?

11533222222221.content: Okay, but which exactly will you end up in? Will it be the last game that was made for the series so far being Sly Cooper: Thieves In Time? Or will it be one of the early games?
11533222222221.title: Which one?

choices: Yes, but before he can say anything a hidden alarm goes off.
115332222222211.content:
You slowly began to open your eyes once that bright flash of light had finally faded away. When you did though you quickly realized taht you weren't in front of your TV anymore. Not only that, but it didn't look like you were in your own world anymore. And upon looking around the area you soon realized that worse yet was that you had somehow shrunk and were now in a museum trapped inside a glass case with a large diamond. Thoughts began to race through you head of how did you get here? And how could you find your way back home to your world? (if there was a way to get back)

And yet no answer came to you as you let out a heavy sigh and said out loud, "Well, I guess I have no choice but wait in here until someone shows up. Hopefully I'll be to get their attention and maybe I can ask for their help."

Right you had uttered those words though your attention was brought towards the ceiling of the building as you a lone figure pull out a something before they put up against the glass and cut a circle through it. Once this happened you saw the glass formed circle was easily lifted upward before it set down next to the opening. After this was done your eyes widen in shock when you saw the figure lower a rope downward before they slid down it revealing that it was the anthro raccoon thief Sly Cooper himself.

Seeing this though only caused your mouth to go agape as you said to yourself, "Sly Cooper? I can't believe that I ended up in his game and that his actually right in front of me. This is so weird and yet awesome at the same time since I've always thought he was pretty cool." You quickly shook your from side to side before you added, "No, I can't let myself get distracted. I have to try and get attention when he get over here since I know that he may be a thief. But he is actually a good guy."

You were broken out of your thoughts when you heard the hazel's eyed thief's voice from outside the glass casing as he pressed hius finger towards his right ear and said into the ear piece, "Okay Bentley, I've made it the diamond without any problems actually. I should be able to meet you and Murray in the back of the building in no time."

You then saw the well fit raccoon use that same tool from early to cut another circle like hole. And once you saw him make an opening you quickly took your chance and called out, "Excuse me, Sly. Please look down here. I need your help."

Now the only question was did the gray and black ring tailed thief notice you?
115332222222211.title: Sly Cooper: Thieves In Time

12.content: What world are you from?
12.title: "Normal Sized Video Game Character"

1212.content: Navi was wandering the lost woods, when suddenly, she spotted a small human boy on the ground unconscious. He was very small, smaller than her foot! she picked him up and brought him to a tree. She wondered what she could do with him: she could help him, she could travel with him, she could abandon him, and she could even enslave him! as Navi thought of the possibilities, the boy started to wake up. He opened his eyes and saw Navi towering above him. He was scared still, and he couldn't find words to say. He stood there staring at her for about 2 minutes until finally Navi noticed that he was awake. After Navi saw him she proceeded to....
1212.title: Navi the mega fairy

12121.content: She proceeded to swiftly grab him in her hands and give him a stare. "Wh-wh-what are you gonna do with m-me?" he stammered scared out of his wits. Navi replied with an evil smirk, "You're gonna be my new slave little boy!". "Wh-what!? NO! I refuse to do anything for you!" He screamed. Navi smirked again, "If you disobey me.... I'll kill you, SLOWLY and PAINFULLY!". The boy had a horrified look on his face "No way, you're bluffing! you wouldn't waste a good slave would you?" He yelled. Navi smirked again, "I'M not bluffing, but you don't know if i'm lying to you or not. So what'll it be, will you agree to be my slave, or suffer the pain of death FOREVER...."
12121.title: Enslave him

121212.content:
"N-no! I refuse!" he yelled, "Even if refusing to be a slave kills me, at least i'll be away from you!". Navi Gained an evil smile an whispered evilly, "So, that is your choice then?" She dropped him down towards her foot and kicked him backup into her ginormous hands. She yelled, "SO BE IT!" as she flicked his body down flat on her palm, and then she placed her other hand sideways over that one. She started to put on a little bit of pressure, but then she squeezed harder and harder until she heard a pop and felt liquid on her hands. She opened up her hands and stared at them for a few seconds before wiping them off, saying, "the torture has only begun..."












The End...?
121212.title: Refuse

1212121.content:
The boy felt pain, everything was dark. He was dead, he knew it, but if he was dead, why did he still feel like he was in Navi's hand? He slowly opened his eyes to see Navi staring back at him. "AAAAGGGGHHH!" he screamed, "how am I alive! I thought you killed me! I still feel the pain...". Navi laughed, "HAHAHA! Don't you know? I'm a fairy! I can revive the dead! As long as I will it, you can't die!" she emphasized this by squishing his body between her thumb and pointer finger. he instantly came back, and felt the pain. "Don't you see what I meant?" She said, "I will torture you forever I could stick you to my foot using tree sap and take a run, then every time i took a step, you would appear on my left foot, die painfully, appear on my right foot and die painfully, and so on. I could use your accumulated blood as nail polish. I could even eat you over and over again so i would never go hungry! the killing possibilities are endless!"

The Boy immediately wished that he had chosen to be her slave, and had spared himself this awful fate. "So, what form of torture should we do first?" Navi wondered.
1212121.title: Navi the murder psychopath

12123.content: Navi decided that she didn't care about this guy, so she decided to kill him. She picked him up and closed her right hand around his legs and waist, and her left hand around his head and torso. She gripped him as tight as she could, and *snap!* she snapped him in half like a twig. Navi then decided to eat the body since she was hungry, and with just a 'Grip, a Snap, and a Gulp' he was gone.
12123.title: KILL HIM!

choices: YOU DON"T GET A SECOND CHOICE!!!!!!!!
12221.content:
Falco was in his arwing, parked on a nice grassy planet. He was pacing back and forth, wondering what to do. "Ugh." He grunted, "It's boring around here. There aren't any evil guys to get rid of, and there are no new places." He exited his arwing, took off his boots, and leaned against a nearby tree. "I wish I had something that i could beat my boredom into, or even a person who I can do a favor for."

...

"Man, I really AM bored" he thought as he proceeded to lay down at the base of the tree. He rested his head in his hands and closed his eyes, thinking of how to end his boredom. Just as he was about to fall asleep, he shifted his feet and his heel landed on something... soft. Falco opened his eyes and sat up, wondering what it was. He lifted his foot and picked up the object in the palm of his hand. "What is this?" Falco thought, "It looks like a living thing, but i've never seen anything like it before!" The creature started to stir, and shake. It got up, and started to open it's eyes. It started to look around, then it looked at him and muttered something softly.

"Ummmmm.... He-Hello...."
12221.title: Falco's predicament

choices: Falco found something to beat his boredom into.
122211.title: Falco's Thoughts

1222112.content:
"Sure I'll help you" Falco lied. "Thank you for helping me. My eyes are still adjusting, so I need it." said the human, "By the way, my name is Chris". "Nice to meet you Chris. I'm Falco." said Falco, "Now that we know each other's names, I'll need to find a place for you to live in temporarily so that you'll stay safe." While Falco was thinking of what to do next, he 'Accidentally' closed his fist as tightly as he could around Chris' body. "AAAAAGGGGGGHHHHH!!!! STOP FALCO YOU"RE HURTING ME!!!" Falco look back at him with a fake worried expression and tone, and said, "Sorry! I'll be more careful now!", he then 'worriedly' asked, "Are you okay? Did you break anything?". Chris moved the parts of his body around to check, then he proceeded to answer, "No, surprisingly I didn't break a single thing. I wonder how?" Chris thought to himself, "Wow! I thought I was going to die! how did I come out without injuries?"

While Chris was questioning how he was alive, Falco had finally come to a conclusion, "So, his body is able to take extreme pain and pressure but not be damaged?" Falco thought, "then I know just where to put him!"

"Hey Chris, are your eyes still impaired?" Falco asked. "Yeah, they are." Chris answered, "Everything is blurry and dark. I can't even tell my right hand from my left hand!". Falco nodded and pretended to keep thinking for about one more minute until he spoke up, "Chris, I think I have finally found out a place where you can live!" Chris perked up at his comment, "Really! Where!" he said eagerly. "here, let me help guide you to it" said Falco as he closed his fist around Chris and entered his arwing, with an unsuspecting Chris in his hand and an evil grin on his face.


Where is Falco going to put Chris?
1222112.title: Falco the Trickster

123.content: What are you? A human, or a pokemon?
123.title: We all live, in a pokemon world!

12321.title: What kind of pokemon are you?

1232121.content: which ones will you pick?

13.content:
You are in your house, getting ready to play video games. You take the game you were going to play and stick it in the system. After you did this, you hear a whirring sound. You turn around and see a circular looking swirly thing hovering in the air. You are shocked at what you see, and you go to inspect it. It is about your height, and it is as thin as paper. You then decide to poke it.

*poke*

Suddenly, you start to get sucked in! You try to pull out, but it's no use! You finally succumb to the pull, and get sucked into the port-

---------------------------------------------------
You suddenly wake up and take a good look around you. You finally notice that you are in the game that you were about to play! You then realize that you are shorter. ALOT shorter. You are in...
13.title: Choose a Game!

131.content: You are in the mario world! But, where in the mario world are you?
131.title: Super Mario Bros

1312.content:
You look around and realize that you are in World 5 of New Super Mario Brothers Wii! You notice that you are close to Iggy's 1st castle. You remember that the next level is that godawful poison lake, and how much you hated it. You hope that you don't have to go through it, but then you remember that you have a small* problem right now. You decide to see if anyone is nearby, but you can't see very far. You don't bother trying to go somewhere because the forest is too dangerous, and you would probably be killed instantly. For a few minutes you sit there, thinking, when you suddenly feel massive tremors. You look around until you see that someone is coming! You try to get their attention by screaming things like, "Hey! Listen! Down here! Look!" but to no avail. You suddenly realize that they'll run you over soon! You then notice that it's your favorite Video Game Character! You start shouting things like, "STOP! DON'T MOVE!!!!", but they don't seem to notice. You try to run, but you trip on your own feet. The foot starts to come down on you, but you try to give one final shout, "STOP!!!!!!"



*Pun intended


Who is the Character?
1312.title: In a colossal forest (NSMBW)

choices: Lift her foot and look at you.
Stomp the ground hard and rapidly
13121.content:
Wendy was walking through the forest, heading back to bowser's castle. "Ugh! I can't believe that those four beat me!" she yelled, "Who left those Penguin Suits in my castle anyway!". She kept walking until she saw some micro goombas gathering a few feet away. An evil smile appeared on her face as she took of her shoes and ran over, stomping them into the ground and squishing them. "I always hated those things...." She muttered, as she stomped a few more, "I wish they wouldn't die so fast, so that I could keep stomping them.". She began to get closer to Iggy's castle, so she started to walk a little faster. She finally stopped, close to the castle, and she felt a micro goomba under her foot. However, she also felt it moving, "Huh? Why isn't it dead yet?" She thought, "Might as well end its puny life." She started to grind her foot into the ground, feeling the micro goomba wiggle and squirm.

-----------------------------------------------------------
"STOOOOOOOPPPPPPPpmmmmfffuuuurrfffhht" Your cry was muffled by her foot landing on you, crushing your body. You feel A TON of pain right now, as if somebody put 2 empire state buildings on top of you, "That's probably how big she is." you think, "I have to get her attention somehow!". You feel her start to grind her feet into you. The pain you feel has now been doubled! You start to poke her foot, but nothing is happening! You keep trying to get her to stop, when you finally think that maybe you should try something else. You bite into her foot and lick it furiously. It tastes like moldy bread You hear a light yelp as the foot's pressure lifts slightly. You're about to celebrate, but then you feel the foot press down and grind again, this time twice as much pressure, and twice as much grinding speed. You mentally facepalm as you feel the weight of 8 Empirte state buildings come down on you.

-----------------------------------------------------------

"Why. won't. you. DIE!!" Wendy yelled, furious that you bit and licked her. After 3 more minutes of unsuccessful grinding, she finally decides to......
13121.title: Wendy O. Koopa

131211.content: You finally feel the bone-crushing weight come off you. You feel relieved, but that feel ing quickly goes away as you see your favorite character staring angrily at you. "SO! YOU'RE THE UNKILLABLE PEST!" she boomed, picking you up with 2 of her claws and pinching you tightly, "I'M GOING TO HAVE TO PUNISH YOU FOR BITING ME!". "Wh-what are you going to do?" you stammer. "HMMMMMMM...... I'VE GOT IT!" she exclaimed, "I'm going to....."
131211.title: Puny Pest

1312111.content:
"MAKE YOU MY SLAVE!" she exclaimed. "WHAT!" you yell, "N-no! PLEASE! Don't do this!". "TOO BAD SHRIMP, FROM NOW ON WHAT I SAY, GOES!" she yelled, "AND NOW THAT WE'VE GOT THAT SETTLED, I HAVE TO GET BACK TO WORLD 8! HAVE A NICE RIDE!" she held you, face up, to her foot as she slid it into her shoe, adding an extra hard stomp for effect, as she began the 5-day walk to Bowser's Castle. The pain inside tripled and became like 24 Empire state buildings.



Where will wendy stop next?
1312111.title: "make you my slave!"

1312112.content:
"MAKE YOU A RING!" she yells. "A ring?" you wonder, "That's a punishment?". Wendy takes her wand and waves it at you three times, trapping your body in rings! She picks you up and yells, "ALRIGHT RUNT! I HAVE A LONG WALK COMING, SO YOUR JOB IS TO MASSAGE MY FEET WHEN THEY START TO ACHE. GOT IT!?" squeezing you for extra effect. "Yeah I got it." you whimper, cowering in fear, not looking foreword to it.... "GOOD." she said, " YOU KNOW YOUR PLACE." she hit her wand on the ground and the top popped off. "I'll be keeping you in here while I walk so I don't have to carry you." she said trapping you inside. It was a tight, hard, and extremely uncomfortable space, bouncing you around whenever she swung it.


When Wendy reached world 6 she opened the staff, letting you roll out harshly on to the ground. Noticing that you were asleep, she stepped on you and jumped up and down. Moaning in pain, you awoke, "Good, you're awake." she said, suddenly gaining a joyful face, "guess what time it is! It's...."
1312112.title: "Make you (into) a ring!"

choices: Go through a door (void is gone)
Stay at the top/ look around (void is still there)
13131.content: You're on a tall, white tower, with a few multicoolred doors in front of you. You realize that you are on Flipside Tower! You then realize that the doors are huge, and you don't know what to do. After thinking for a little while, you decide to....
13131.title: On a tall, White Tower (SPM)

131311.content:
"I think I'll go through a door." You think, "But, which one should I enter?"




ROY G. BIV
131311.title: Go through a door (void is gone)

1313112.content: B-I-V which one will you choose?
1313112.title: B-I-V

13131122.content: You decide to go to the violet door. After all, the Overthere is a nice relaxing place, and you might be able to get help there. You enter the door, only to find yourself in...
13131122.title: Violet (Underwhere & Overthere!)

132.content: You're in the world of sonic the hedgehog! You start trying to figure out what happened when suddenly you see a figure running towards you. You look closer and realize that it's....
132.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

1321.content: It's Sonic himself! You shout towards him in glee, only to notice that he is getting bigger and bigger as he runs along the grass. You Realize that he'll run over you soon, and that you don't have time to run away. You sit there and pray that he misses you. He gets closer and closer until......
1321.title: Sonic

13212.content: As sonic gets closer and closer you cringe in fear as he finally gets so close that you feel strong winds. You close your eyes tight and wait, but he misses you and keeps going. You breathe a sigh of relief as look over to sonic. When you do, you see that he is...
13212.title: He misses

132122.content: Sonic starts to Come back at you at high speeds. You frantically try to run but to no avail. Sonic's foot comes down on you, but you find out that you are still alive! But, where are you?
132122.title: TURNING AROUND!?!?!

choices: He stops cLose enough for you to lick his shoe
13213.content: Sonic began to skid on his heels and slow down. You look up as he gets closer to you until.....
13213.title: Something else

132131.content:
Sonic came to a complete stop. You looked up in shock at how big he was. You then noticed that he was looking at you as well. "Whoa." you said quietly.

"Err…hi, little person. Umm…want some help?" Sonic asked gently, obviously uncertain as to what else he could do.

"Can you hear me?" you asked. He nodded. "I don't know what happened to me. And can you help me find somewhere safe to stay? Until I can figure out how to get back to normal, and back home?"

"Sure." he answered, snatching you up so fast that it causes you to scream. "What? I'm not sure you'd like being on the ground on the way there."

"You just startled me. Where are we going?"
132131.title: Kindness

choices: "I've got you, and you can't escape"
"where's Tails? And did I step on a bug?"
132132.content:
You look up at the hedgehog to see that he was skidding slower. He kept skidding until he stopped right over you. You try to run away, but Sonic's feet fell down on top of you smothering you under them.
You struggle and squirm under Sonic's shoe as you feel him stretching his legs. You keep trying to get out until you hear.
132132.title: He stops right on you

choices: "But of course I'm gonna help ya!", he says
"But the people I help aren't of such a pathetic bug size, y'know..."
1321322.content:
You feel Sonic shifting his weight, as his his foot was getting somewhat lighter, until eventually, you feel he's taking his foot off you. You're relieved, but then you hear the blue titan say: "Yuck, what did I step on? Is it a bug?" Your relief immediately turns into fear. You're too achy to move, so you just stare and try to see what happens. He then picks you up and his eyes widen as he notices you're not a bug, but a tiny human.

"Geez, buddy, you're so tiny! Are you okay? You're so lucky I didn't crush you!" he says with an innocent grin, but since you're lying on your side on his palm, you see his feet in sneakers. He seems to have wiggled his toes inside his shoes.

"Can you even hear me?" he asks. You nod your head to answer this question.

"Ah, ah, ah! No nodding, little one! I wanna find out if I can hear you! Come on, say something!" he asks.

"Yes, I can hear you, Sonic!" you say, or yell, to be specific.

"Okay, good! I can hear you alright! What happened to you?"

"I've got no idea, Sonic, I woke up here, in your world and then the next thing that happened was you stepping on me"

"Whoops, sorry about that again, lil' guy..." he says, blushing.

"Will you help me get back to normal, Sonic?"

"Hmmm..." he thinks. "I can see you know me for helping 'n' saving people, lil' one! But..."

Having heard this "But...", you begin to tremble in fear, awaiting his judgement. You feel like an ant at some colossal god's power. And frankly, this feeling is pretty right.

Sonic then finishes his thought.
1321322.title: At the feet of the blue blur

1341.content:
Waking up, you found that your vision was blurry, and you could hear some loud, rumbling sounds in the distance. You begin to walk forward, only to run into a tall, green pillar that was about two times your height. Examining the pillar, you realized that this giant pillar was actually a blade of grass!

"What the-!? I... I was shrunk!?" you yell in shock.

You looked around your current location, scanning the area for someone who might be able to help you, or somewhere you might be able to go. But all you could see was the grass surrounding you. You walked aimlessly among the green pillars, trying to find something to help you get a better view, until you found a rather large rock laying in the grass. Using the slanted pages, you climbed up to the top of the book and looked around. To the north, you could see what looked like colossal tents and a few small structures. Some of the structures seemed to be surrounded by various weapons, and you could smell several strong scents coming from others. In the west, you could see massive brown pillars towering in the distance, which you presume to be trees making up a forest. The east didn't seem to have anything in particular in it, only more grass, and a path that stretched through it. The south seemed to be a more mountainous area, and you could see what looked to be a waterfall in the distance, which you assumed led to a river.

Though the north seemed to be the most logical choice to go for help, you could feel more of those strong rumbles, which you now presumed to be footsteps, coming from the forest as well. It might be risky to go South or East, but they were still options that you could take.

You decided to traverse...
1341.title: Fire Emblem: Awakening

13411.content:
You began your walk to the buildings in the distance, noticing that the sun was still partially below the horizon.

"Huh... it must be pretty early right now." you say.

After a long walk towards the towering structures in the distance, you find a small shield near one of the buildings that you climb up and stand on to get a good look at your surroundings.

Looking up, you noticed that it was getting brighter outside.

"It seems the sun is almost all the way up..." you observed.

Around you, you could see several tents scattered about the area. Since it was still relatively early in the morning, you figured that many of the people that might live in these tents would still be asleep. You could also see several buildings around. From one building, you heard the sound of metal clanging against metal rapidly and sharply, and from the other, you could smell the tantalizing scent of food. You began to walk towards one of the tents, but suddenly...

*Grumble...* your stomach cries out.

"Damn, I haven't eaten in hours, and that walk took a lot out of me too..." you thought to yourself, "Maybe I should try to get some food first."


You noticed earlier that the tents were much farther away than the buildings, and your stomach might not be able to take much more physical activity without food.
But you also realize that you'd be more likely to find people in the tents, because it was still so early.
You decide to head to...
13411.title: North (The camp)

13413.content:
You thought you might take your chances in the plains or the river. Being in a crowded place like the camp, or a mysterious area like the forest could be dangerous for you. You figured that it might be better to be elsewhere, in a more open space.
The river and the mountainous area were rater far away, and you knew that it might take several days for you to get there, but the plains were wide open and very flat, meaning that if you encountered any danger, you would have nowhere to run or hide.

You could also hear clanging sounds coming from the plains. They were very faint, but they were there. A wide open space like the plain might be a good place for you to get spotted.

You decided to travel towards the...
13413.title: East/South (Plains/River)

choices: Go towards the source of clanking noise.
134131.content:
You decided to travel through the plains. You walked through the large field of grass for hours, without a clear destination in mind. You walked close to the path, so that you could tell where you were. As you walked, the clanking sounds got louder, and hurt your ears more. You figured that there might be someone wearing that armor that was sitting near the buildings from the camp.

"Maybe it would be a good idea to go somewhere else..." you thought.

You wondered if you should try to get closer to the clanking noises that you could hear on your left, and see if you could get some help. On the other hand, you wondered if you should step out onto the path, and see if you could get a better view of what was ahead of you.

You decided to...
134131.title: Plain

1343.content: Maybe one of these two?
1343.title: Another one

1352.content: You see that you are in the world of okami! You look around. You appear to be inn some kind of city. You don't see many people, but before you can wonder why, you feel the ground shaking. You turn around to see...
1352.title: Okami/ Okamiden

13523211.content:
"Hey guy, what the hell ya doing here?" Issun said, walking up to you. "What do you mean? And why am I so tiny? Like you?" You asked, but that made Issun rage. "I'm not tiny! I'm fun sized!" Issun yelled. He soon calmed down, and told you, "It's not safe here right now, we're in the Aristocratic Corner of Sei'an City in Nippon."

"But again, why am I bug sized?" You asked. "Maybe your a celestial envoy, we'd need to get you in custody right now, Rush Hour is about to start, and the last thing you wanna be in Rush hour is bug sized." Issun said, taking your arm and dashing.

You both hid in a dark corner, and kept lookout. "So, what are we waiting for?" You asked. "Someone." Issun said.

Someone then came walking up to the dark corner, it was...
13523211.title: Safety??

13523221.content:
"Hey there little dude" he said, " what're ya doing down there?". You reply, "Uh.... I don't know" as you suddenly glance down at his feet
, you had never noticed how sexy they were. Kurow noticed this and he picked you up and started to carelessly toss you up and down in one hand. "heh, little guy" he said, still tossing you, "It's pretty dangerous out here. How about you come with me?". "umm... okay..." you reply. "Heh heh, good" he says, "now, where will you travel? You can go in my flute, or my shoe". You are starting to feel kind of sick from the tossing, so you answer, " I'll travel in your..."





You choose to travel....
13523221.title: Kurow

Will you join the battle between hope and despair?

135332112.content: Do you want Aoi Asahina, The Ultimate Swimmer and doughnut lover?
135332112.title: Aoi Asahina, The Ultimate Swimmer

choices: On an oddly smooth, wet surface
1353321121.content:
Suddenly, your vision is taken from you as everything goes dark. For a moment, you don't know what is happening or where you are, but after a few minutes pass, your vision returns to you as you wake up.

Shooting up from your prone position, you attempt to look around your current location. However, you feel a sharp pain inside your head, and your vision goes blurry.

"My head!" you think to yourself, "What happened to me?"

Your eyes are still blurry from the headache, but as the pain begins to subside, your vision gets clearer and clearer. Eventually, your vision clears up enough that you are able to get a grasp on your surroundings.

"W-what the…" You stammer, "What is this?"

As you look around your surroundings, you notice that you're…
1353321121.title: Where am I?

13533211212.content: What are your surroundings like?
13533211212.title: Somewhere else...

info.brief_description: One day, you are sucked into a video game world and shrunken to a small size.What happens?
info.description:
You are shrunken down in a video game. Choose 1 out of many worlds to explore as either the small or large character(s).

Please add chapters if you can.

If you choose to add a chapter, please use good GRAMMAR. Otherwise anything goes. The giants can be friendly, mean, etc.

Swearing is allowed, just don't be excessive with it.

Characters can be cruel or gentle, male or female, aware or unaware, and can be OOC or not.

The Video Game characters can be the ones who brought you there, or not know how you got there at all.

The Main character (You) may be killed, but try to not make a dead end where all options lead to death.

EDIT: If you choose "Shrunken Human", then please keep it only their perspective, If you choose "Normal sized Game Character", then Keep it from only their perspective. If you want to switch perspectives, choose the "Both" option.

EDIT: I changed the rating to 18+ because the story might get more violent as it goes on.

DISCLAIMER: All Characters and worlds belong to their owners at Nintendo, Sega, Gamefreak, HAL, etc.

Thank You!
info.pretty_title: Shrink in a Video Game World
